title: Runtime error (PythonException): Unable to add polyline to document
question:
I’m following this video, 
4.1_Points | Rhino3D.Education
 … towards the end, I receive the error in italics  below … can anyone tell me why its happening and how to fix it?


import rhinoscriptsyntax as rs


all_pts = 

for j in range(30):

if j %2 == 0:

pts = rs.AddPoint(j, 4, 0)

else :

pts = rs.AddPoint(j, 10, 0)

all_pts.append(pts)

pl = rs.AddPolyline(all_pts)


Runtime error (PythonException): Unable to add polyline to document
